metadata.feature_description: Search wiki articles and display filtered lists with pagination

steps.expected: Wiki module loads with search box and article list
steps.actual: Wiki module loaded successfully with search box, 'All Articles' tab selected, and 27 articles displayed

steps.action: Enter 'markdown' in search box and click 'Search articles'
steps.expected: Search results page shows articles matching 'markdown' keyword
steps.actual: Redirected to Search Results page with scope=Wiki, showing 3 matching articles (Markdown Test Article - Claude Testing, Markdown Test Article - Jan 2026, Wiki Links Test Article)

steps.action: Click on 'toc-test' tag in the Tags sidebar
steps.expected: Article list filters to show only articles with 'toc-test' tag
steps.actual: URL changed to ?tags=toc-test, article list filtered to show 2 articles tagged with 'toc-test'

steps.action: Click 'My Articles' tab on the Wiki module
steps.expected: Article list shows only articles created by current user
steps.actual: My Articles tab selected, showing 27 articles created by SuperUser Account

steps.action: Navigate to Wiki module with ?category=draftonly parameter
steps.expected: Article list shows only draft articles awaiting moderation
steps.actual: Draft articles view loaded showing 1 draft article (Test Draft Article - Jan 16 2026) with pending moderation status

steps.action: Navigate to Wiki module with ?page=1 parameter (second page)
steps.expected: Second page of articles displayed with pagination controls
steps.actual: Page 2 loaded, showing 'No articles were found' message as there are only 27 articles and page size is larger than remaining articles

steps.action: Select 'Sort by title' from the sort dropdown
steps.expected: Articles are sorted alphabetically by title
steps.actual: URL changed to ?sort=title, articles reordered alphabetically (Activity Journal Test Article, Article with Special Chars, Case Sensitivity Test - lowercase, etc.)

steps.action: Select 'Sort by views' from the sort dropdown
steps.expected: Articles are sorted by view count (most viewed first)
steps.actual: URL changed to ?sort=views, articles reordered by view count with most viewed articles first

steps.action: Enter special characters '<>&"'@#$%' in search box and click 'Search articles'
steps.expected: Search handles special characters gracefully without errors
steps.actual: Search executed successfully, special characters URL-encoded (%3C%3E&%22%27@#$%), redirected to Search Results page showing 'No results found' - system handled special characters without crashing
Search Results page displayed with 'No results found.' message, search term shown in input, Wiki scope filter applied correctly

observations: The Wiki search redirects to a global Search Results page with Scope=Wiki parameter, rather than filtering in-place on the Wiki module
Tag filtering uses URL parameter (?tags=tagname) and updates the article list dynamically
Sort options include: last active, created, title, and views - all working correctly with appropriate URL parameters
Pagination uses page parameter (0-indexed) in the URL
Draft articles view requires moderator permission and uses ?category=draftonly parameter
Special characters in search are properly URL-encoded and handled without causing errors
